meanings.definition: Having more knobs or protuberances than something else.
meanings.sent1: The knubbier surface of the rock made it easier to climb.
meanings.sent2: The new phone case is knubbier than the old one.
meanings.sent3: The knubbier handle on the door made it look like a tiny mountain range.
meanings.sent4: Her knubbier fingers danced across the piano keys with precision.
meanings.sent5: The knubbier texture of the carpet felt like walking on tiny hills.
